_comment1: === PUBLIC CONFIGURATION (safe to expose via web) ===
_comment2: No secrets should ever be in this file - only identifiers that require authentication to use
_companyNameNote: Company name displayed in the dashboard header and sign-in page
_clientIdNote: Azure App Registration Client ID (public by design for MSAL)
_authorityNote: Your tenant domain or tenant ID (public identifier, not sensitive)
_planIdNote: Planner Plan ID (GUID - requires valid Graph token to access, safe to expose)
_allowedTenantsNote: List of allowed tenant domains for authentication
_adminGroupNameNote: RECOMMENDED: Group display name (more secure - no GUID exposed publicly). User must be a member to access Admin Portal.
_adminGroupIdNote: ALTERNATIVE: Entra ID Group Object ID (GUID). Less secure since ID is exposed. Leave empty if using adminGroupName.
_adminUsersNote: OPTIONAL: Email allowlist for admin access (takes precedence over group checks). Use for granular control or if no admin group exists. Leave empty array [] to rely only on group membership.
